attributes.action: Remove Baroness Uddin from the House of Lords.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It has been decided that Baroness Uddin should not be prosecuted for theft after misleading the authoritys and stating her main residence was a flat in Kent. It is clear that the crown prosecution service do not believe a conviction could be gained, and yet by that very statement believe she is probably guilty of something. At the very least she has been economical with the truth and should not sit in any of the countrys legislitive houses.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
